prompt:
Translate the following subtitles into Japanese. 

Correct speech recognition errors and inconsistencies based on context.

Subtitles to process:
[
  {
    "start": "00:02:05,020",
    "end": "00:02:08,539",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "No matter what you need,"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:02:10,018",
    "end": "00:02:11,418",
    "lang": "zh",
    "text": "一定有包天野的色的"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:02:12,866",
    "end": "00:02:16,386",
    "lang": "en",
    "text": "No more than 100 years everything will go to dust."
  }
]

Note that the original timestamps should be PRESERVED for each entry.

Output JSON format only:
```json
[
  {
    "start": "timestamp",
    "end": "timestamp",
    "ja": "Japanese text with optional furigana annotations"
  }
]
```

response.ja: 必ず何かの方法があるはずだ
100年もすれば、すべてが塵と化す。
